name: Logback Logging Configuration
description: Configure structured logging with Logback in Spring Boot

steps.title: Create Logback Configuration
steps.description: Define appenders, log patterns, and log levels

notes: Use INFO level for production, DEBUG for development
Configure log rotation to prevent disk space issues
Never log sensitive data (passwords, tokens, PII)
Use structured logging (JSON) for better log aggregation
Consider ELK/Splunk integration for centralized logging
